1.startingText: Drag and drop words on the grid to create new words horizontally, vertically and diagonally.
1.wordDroppedText: You can drag words after you've placed them.
1.endingText: Press the right arrow at the bottom to continue

2.startingText: Only words with 3 or more letters are counted
2.wordDroppedText: Diagonal words must be go from left to right and top to bottom to count.

3.startingText: Rotate words by selecting them in the grid or from the list and clicking the rotate button at the bottom
